items.text:
You've heard the ancient, moss-covered, and vine-draped detritus
of the Alluvial Ruins described as “peaceful,” but as you
approach, a shiver runs up your spine. You hear a soft rustling, like
hundreds of reeds rubbing together in the distance. You move quietly
through the ruins and find a gap to peek through. There, in the heart
of one of the ruins, you can see dozens of reclaimers milling about,
and you see several bulbous sacs adhered to every surface. It looks
like you’ve found the reclaimer nest.

setup instructions for this location. Instead,
search the General set for three Reclaimer Seekers, and shuffle them
into the path deck. Then, after setup, search the General set for a
Reclaimer Polyp, and put it into play.
